content.introduction:
Finds static function and variable definitions in anonymous namespace.

In this case, 
static
 is redundant, because anonymous namespace limits the
visibility of definitions to a single translation unit.

namespace
 
{


  
static
 
int
 
a
 
=
 
1
;
 
// Warning.


  
static
 
const
 
int
 
b
 
=
 
1
;
 
// Warning.


  
namespace
 
inner
 
{


    
static
 
int
 
c
 
=
 
1
;
 
// Warning.


  
}


}

The check will apply a fix by removing the redundant 
static
 qualifier.
